org.apache.spark.sql

Class UserDefinedPythonFunction

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.sql.UserDefinedPythonFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, scala.Equals, scala.Product

    public class UserDefinedPythonFunction
extends Object
implements scala.Product, scala.Serializable
    A user-defined Python function. To create one, use the pythonUDF functions in functions. This is used by Python API.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
